snippet.title: Jackal - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3124230/Jackal/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=announcement

A blood-soaked fusion of Hotline Miami and Pulp Fiction, delivering brutal executions and relentless close-combat.

Gamers worldwide, prepare for an adrenaline-charged thrill ride with Jackal, the highly anticipated top-down shooter from the legendary indie game developer Michał Marcinkowski, creator of Soldat, King Arthur’s Gold, and Maniac. Announced today on Steam, Jackal merges the relentless brutality of Hotline Miami with a Tarantino-esque narrative set against the gritty backdrop of 1970s Las Vegas.

"Jackal combines my love of John Wick fight scenes, Scorsese's mobsters, Tarantino's storytelling, and the soul of the 1970s," says the creator Michał Marcinkowski.

Jackal is set to launch at the end of Q2 2025. 

Add the game to your wishlist now, on the Steam Page. 


Contact: pr@thd.vg
